ðŸ“– Summary: ttyd is a command-line tool that allows users to share their terminal over the web. It offers features such as ZMODEM/trzsz file transfer, Sixel image output, and SSL support, and is built on libuv and WebGL2 for speed. It supports various platforms including macOS, Linux, and Windows.
